alert.note: Alert for Broome; Delaware; Otsego; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 7:31PM EST until March 07 at 8:15PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Otsego County in central New York... Southeastern Broome County in central New York... Delaware County in central New York... Sullivan County in central New York... Eastern Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Eastern Wyoming County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 815 PM EST. * At 731 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Franklin to Conyngham, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockland, Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Hazleton, Dunmore, Kingston, Fallsburg, Nanticoke, Plains and Carbondale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
